tool_description: Tracks completed maintenance services and updates vehicle service history with detailed records.

completion_mileage.description: Odometer reading when service was completed

service_provider.description: Name of service provider or mechanic

cost.description: Cost of the service in dollars

parts_replaced.description: List of parts that were replaced

error_messages: Invalid vehicle ID: Vehicle not found in system.
Invalid completion date: Date cannot be in the future.
Invalid mileage: Completion mileage must be greater than previous recorded mileage.
Negative cost: Service cost cannot be negative.
Missing service type: Service type cannot be empty.
usage: Record completed maintenance services with all relevant details. The tool updates the vehicle's service history and calculates next service intervals.

service_record_id.description: Unique identifier for this service record

updated_history_count.description: Total number of service records for this vehicle

next_service_due.description: Next service due date based on this completion

status.description: Status of the tracking operation (success, warning, error)
